title: Cold War 2.0 | Interview with Noam Chomsky (with ENG subtitles)
description:
Our Editor-in-chief, Sándor Jászberényi asked the linguist credited as being the most cited living scholar of our time about race, language, cancel culture, the world order, and the climate catastrophe. At 93 years of age, Professor NOAM CHOMSKY is doing fine. The same cannot be said of the world.
***
This interview was made on October 4, 2021, appearing in its entirety in The Continental Literary Magazine's first issue, themed PREJUDICE. Get your copy at Barnes & Noble nationwide, or online:
https://continentalmagazine.com
